DOC.brief_summary: The subject place consecutively random order five different position draw lot . Oxygen saturation ( SaO2 ) vital sign ( pulse rate , respiratory rate , systolic blood pressure , diastolic blood pressure body temperature ) measure position 10 , 25 40 minute .
DOC.detailed_description: The semi-seated position bed 45° : SSPB-45° The semi-seated position bed 60° : SSPB-60° Seated position bed 90° : SPB-90° Lying right side body 45° : LRSB-45° , Lying left side body 45° : LLSB-45° A questionnaire consist Subjects ' Introduction Form Vital Signs-SaO2 Record Form use collect data . The subject place consecutively random order five different position , SSPB-45° , SSPB-60° , SPB-90° , LRSB-45° , LLSB-45° , draw lot . Oxygen saturation ( SaO2 ) vital sign ( pulse rate , respiratory rate , systolic blood pressure , diastolic blood pressure body temperature ) measure position 10 , 25 40 minute . Oxygen saturation vital sign measure finger pulse oximeter ( Nellcor N-560 ) . Nail polish remove measurement oxygen saturation , physical restraint subject remove . Body temperature measure via ear tympanic membrane thermometer ( Covidiev Genius 2 ) . Systolic diastolic blood pressure measure calibrated sphygmomanometer leave arm sphygmomanometer ( Erka aneroid sphygmomanometer® ) stethoscope . Pulse rate respiratory rate manually monitor period one minute researcher use wristwatch . Verbal write informed consent obtain subject closest relative .
DOC.criteria: Subjects 18 year age able lie position , unilateral/or bilateral lung disease document medical diagnosis physician include study . Patients accept participated study . Patients accepted participate .
